Datasource.Parameter: (SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "leisure" = 'park' OR "leisure" = 'wood' OR "landuse" = 'forest') as greenarea
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_polygon WHERE "waterway" != '' OR "water" != '') as waterway
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE railway='rail') as rail
(SELECT * FROM planet_osm_line WHERE railway='tram') as tram
